text: @realDonaldTrump Wonder how much Covid-19 treatment costs? In about 2 weeks, we can ask the MAGAs at the Tulsa and Arizona rallies, and those who they've infected - although it's kinda hard to talk hooked up to a ventilator or if you're dead.
